TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TextPatternIdentifiers extends System.Object
public ref class TextPatternIdentifiers abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含 做為識別項的值。

span.span: Contains values used as identifiers for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公開的詳細資訊物件，例如編輯控制項和文件的文字內容。 exposes detailed information of the textual contents of objects such as edit controls and documents. 應該寫入使用者介面自動化提供者，以便它們可以在部分信任環境下運作。UI Automation providers should be written so that they can work in a partial-trust environment. 因為 UIAutomationClient.dll 未設定完全信任，您的提供者程式碼不應該參考該組件。Because UIAutomationClient.dll is not configured for full trust, your provider code should not reference that assembly. 如果這樣做，程式碼可在完全信任環境中執行，但無法在部分信任環境中執行。If it does so, the code may run in a full-trust environment but then fail in a partial-trust environment. 尤其，不要使用來自 UIAutomationClient.dll 中類別的欄位，例如 中的欄位。In particular, do not use fields from classes in UIAutomationClient.dll such as those in . 請改用來自 UIAutomationTypes.dll 中類別的對等欄位，例如 。Instead, use the equivalent fields from classes in UIAutomationTypes.dll, such as .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AnimationStyleAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅限螢幕上出現的動畫動畫的文字列印，但動畫並不會生效。Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not. UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 。The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CultureAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的文化特性 () 屬性，細分到附屬語言層級，例如瑞士法文 (fr-CH) 而非法文 (fr)。

span.span: Identifies the Culture () attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French–Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 請參閱的語言代碼格式的其他詳細資料。See for more detail on the language code format. 預設值是應用程式使用者介面的語言。The default value is the language of the application user interface. > [!NOTE] > 可能有伺服器不支援語言標記，或作者不能使用它。There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it. 在這些情況下會套用預設值。In those cases the default applies.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontNameAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 FontName 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the FontName attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 範例包括"新細明體"和"新細明體 Narrow"。Examples include "Arial Black" and "Arial Narrow". 值為非當地語系化。Values are non-localized. UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是`empty string`。The default value is an `empty string`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontWeightAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 FontWeight 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the FontWeight attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指相對筆劃、 粗細或字型的粗細。Refers to the relative stroke, thickness or boldness of a font. 這建立`lfWeight`欄位[GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp)。This is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in [GDI LOGFONT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/fontext_1wmq.asp). 為了保持一致性，下列的值已採用 LOGFONT 從： 0 = DontCare，100 = 細，200 = ExtraLight 或 UltraLight，300 = 光線，400 = Normal 或 Regular，500 = 中，600 = SemiBold 或 DemiBold，700 = 粗體，800 = ExtraBold 或 UltraBold，以及 900 = 繁重或黑色。For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black. UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 `zero`。The default value is `zero`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ForegroundColorAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 [ForegroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) ([COLORREF](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)) 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the [ForegroundColor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp) ([COLORREF](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/gdi/colors_9xiq.asp)) attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前景色彩就相當於文字或字型色彩。Foreground color is equivalent to the text or font color. UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsReadOnlyAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 IsReadOnly 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the IsReadOnly attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端文字範圍的相關文件的唯讀狀態。The read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range. > [!NOTE] > 如果文件或檔案是唯讀的但您仍然可以編輯它，並將它儲存為另一個檔案，將文字不是唯讀狀態。If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only. UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是 `false`。The default value is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent TextChangedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextChangedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 每當文字內容有修改時，識別引發的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event raised whenever textual content is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1052](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1052)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2052](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2052)]

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 TextFlowDirections () 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the TextFlowDirections () attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是下列值的位元組合： `|` `|` 。The default value is the bitwise combination of the following values: `|` `|` .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent TextSelectionChangedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextSelectionChangedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 每當文字選取有修改時，識別引發的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event raised whenever the text selection is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些文字控制項處理為零寬度的文字選取範圍的文字插入點 （游標），並可能會引發`TextSelectionChangedEvent`游標移動時。Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved. > [!NOTE] > 若要依照資料指標移動，使用者介面自動化用戶端建議保留追蹤所接聽的相對應的插入點變更[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目事件，而不是取決於。To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on . 這個識別碼由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]提供者。This identifier is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] providers. 用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。Client applications should use the equivalent field in .

summary.span: 識別文字範圍的 UnderlineColor 屬性。

span.span: Identifies the UnderlineColor attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自動化提供者會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 這個屬性的值屬於型別。Values for this attribute are of type . 預設值是`null`參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
